DOC.brief_summary: The experimental design multi-center , prospective , non-controlled , non-randomized , single-arm clinical registry trial . The study enroll 5,000 patient receive Firebird2TM Cobalt-ChromiumAlloyed Sirolimus-Eluting Stent implantation . For patient multivessel disease , Firebird 2TM Stent implant . The enrollment patient take 4 month . Clinical follow-up 30 day , 6 month , 12 month , 24 month 36 month . Patients withdraw study due reason replace .
